name: Dead Trigger - Zombie FPS Shooter
description:
Dead Trigger is an innovative FREE zombie shooter 3D game with only one purpose: KILL THEM ALL! Zombies keep spawning there is no escaping them except survive. You have 1 weapon + infinite ammo, all it takes is just two shots to kill one zombie. There are zombies coming to attack you with nobody in your team.

This game features high and realistic graphics and is fun and easy to play! You are left to survive in a forest full of mad zombies. In order to fend off an army of dead you have to become a high-skilled zombie hunter! Can you survive the zombies and become a high skilled zombie hunter?

This game can be played in the browser and in Windows 10 or above, Mac and Linux. I recommend you to download and play it on your computer for ultra fps and performance. Also note that this is a PC game and you will have to extract the files once the game is downloaded into a folder and then enjoy the game!

Join our discord to discuss any bugs or glitches you want to let me know and chat with this games community!
